escrow(address).return: Returns the total amount remaining in escrow for a specific payee.

isOwner().return: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

params.newAccount: is the address the funds available will be migrated to

owner().return: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

payee(uint256).return: Returns the address from an index in the payee array.

payeesLength().return: Returns an length of array of payees.

previousTotalReceived().return: Returns the total amount of Ether received under the previous distribution schemes.

params.shares: is the new shares scheme for payees

params.account: is the address of a payee

released(address).return: Returns the total amount of Ether that has been released to a payee.

shares(address).return: Returns the total number of shares the payee has.

totalEscrow().return: Returns the total amount not yet released from previous distribution schemes.

totalReleased().return: Returns the total amount of Ether that has been released.

totalShares().return: Returns the total number of shares.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

withdrawals(address).return: Returns the total number of Ether withdrawn under current share distribution.

renounceOwnership().notice: thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
